review:
Iam a doctor myself.and surely Surgery was done effortlessly..by dr.azhar.no pain during and after surgery...infact the anaesthesia given was so appropriate.
Issues arise with hospital staff.and truely the cost is double the normal charges.i went to consult Dr azhar.thr receptionist and staff repeatedly insisted me to see another doctor which is unethical.but thanks to practo for giving an appointment prior

Great. Though I had to wait over half an hour for the doctor to actually come and attend to me, the actual extraction process was well-conducted and post-extraction instructions carefully and patiently given. 24 hours later, there is virtually no pain in the jaw.
The procedure was done very efficiently and in time by Dr. Azher,Alhumdullilah. I am happy to consult at Miswak.
reply_text: Thank you so much Ms. Shireen for your valuable feedback

review: He reassured, when necessary. Was smiling and pleasant. He completed the entire procedure quite fast and without causing any discomfort or pain. There was soothing music playing in the background, making the entire experience comfortable.
Very professional and extremely patient. Walked me through the process in detail before starting. Dealt with my complicated With utmost care and removed it, instant relief.
The doctor did a great job of being receptive, understanding and making sure that the entire process was painless and comfortable.

I'd happily recommend Dr. Azher to anyone seeking any type of dental procedures.

review:
Got my wisdom teeth extracted and I must say I was really apprehensive and nervous but Dr Azher made the whole process very easy and comfortable. Also there was very little pain during and after the procedure Alhumdulillah. 
Would totally recommend him to family and friends.
reply_text: Thank you so much for a detailed review. It was a pleasure to treat you.

review: Very polite, good explanation, good care been taken. Good job, Thank you. Will be visiting again for treatment for my parents.
Very good doctor has extracted the teeth without pain. Thanks to him a lot.. thanks sir in extracting my teeth without any pain.

Doctor Azher has performed surgical extraction of wisdom tooth very smoothly . He is very cool and has extracted tooth without causing much discomfort to me. Post extraction instructions were also given in detail.
It's very good treatment and without any pain he did the tooth Extraction. will recommend to my friends

My apprehension of facing pain in the last stage of pulling out a tooth was totally zero due to the workmanship of dr azghar. His work was a great relief to me for which im so fond of his skill. No words can praise.
I Highly recommend Dr.Azher. Because of sensitivity , i troubled him while surgery. But he carried the procedure with lot of patience and smile on his face. God bless him with what all he wants.

He was very pleasant, polite n cautious. He is expert in his line. I had extraction of two of my wisdom teeth. He had done it in minutes. No pain at all even after a day of the extraction. Simply superb. I recommend him strongly.
Very good handling of tooth extraction. No pain experienced. No further complications experienced. Felt very confident and comfortable with the treatment.
it was very good. He is very friendly with the patitent.He gave some special tips on how you will get strong and healthy teeth.

I had my tooth extraction by the doctor and it was completely a painless process. The doctor took time to explain the procedure and after the process made sure that I aware of the after care. 
Efficient, helpful and very knowledgeable.
Dr. Azher was wonderful throughout the extraction which took exactly 2 mins. Plus it was absolutely painless!
Dr Azher displayed excellent professionalism in identifying and carrying out the required dental surgery
I am pretty happy with the kind of work Dr. Azar did! He was careful, attentive and very smooth while working on my teeth. Thanks Dr. Azar for all your help !

Hmm well I was bit nervous to get both my wisdom teeth removed, but Dr.Azhar of Smiline made me feel relaxed and comfortable while he was checking out l felt like pressure asserting on my jaw, next moment he said 'Removed', dats it...so far so good....thnx Dr.Azhar n Thnx Smiline.

As i having problem with the wisdom teeth, he explained me about the problem i will be facing if i still continue with having that teeth and suggested to remove it. He removed the teeth and advised medicines for few days. Overall I am very satisfied with the way he talked to me and suggested remedy to the problem. I will definitely suggest his name to my friends and family members.
